current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require a survey of the preferences of members of the Armed Forces regarding military pay and
			 benefits.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text: Survey of preferences of members of the Armed Forces regarding military pay and benefits

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall carry out an anonymous
			 survey of random members of the Armed Forces
			 regarding their preferences in military pay and benefits.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Military Compensation and Retirement Modernization Commission
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Compensation and Retirement Modernization Commission

text.#text:
The survey under this section shall be conducted for the purpose of soliciting information on the
			 following:

The value that members of the Armed Forces place on the following forms of compensation relative to
			 one another:
Healthcare benefits for retirees under 65 years old.

How the members value different levels of pay or benefits, including the impact of co-payments or
			 deductibles on the value of benefits.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Compensation and Retirement Modernization Commission

text.#text: Any other matters related to military pay and benefits that the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
varies by age, grade, dependent
			 status, and other factors the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Compensation and Retirement Modernization Commission

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall submit a report
			 on
			 the analysis and raw data of the survey to the

text.#text: Upon the completion of the survey required by this section, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Compensation and Retirement Modernization Commission

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall
			 make the report available to the public.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Compensation and Retirement Modernization Commission
